unique-description: Welcome to Scratch 101, a place to view and submit tutorials on anything you enjoy!
For the 101st SDS, make a project showcasing a tutorial on something you're passionate about.
From things like recipes, school concepts, hobbies, current events, or anything else you can think of, create an educational project to teach more people about what you love!
Try and make the project interactive, with pictures, or even sounds! Be sure to view the other tutorials as well!
